issue.title: [JS] Update dependencies, switch to terser
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3691](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3691). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Many dependencies are out of date, give them a bump.

The uglifyjs-webpack-plugin [no longer supports](https://github.com/webpack-contrib/uglifyjs-webpack-plugin/releases/tag/v2.0.0) ES6 minification, switch to terser-webpack-plugin

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3691?focusedCommentId=16673355) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2611
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2611>
